mcq.statement: Which two books of Allama Iqbal were translated into Arabic by Dr. Abdul Wahab Azzam?
mcq.one_liner: The books Zarab-e-Kalim and Payam-e-Mashriq by Allama Iqbal were translated into Arabic by **Dr. Abdul Wahab Azzam**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
